name: Voyage of the Merchant Mecha Fish
name_original: Voyage of the Merchant Mecha Fish
description:
Made for the GOTM jam 19, with the theme voyage 🛥️!

Help Merchant Mecha Fish traverse trough the cold waters of the arctic sea searching for the Chroma Flower, an artifact capable of revealing the true colors of the world.

Manage your fuel by planning strategic routes, while discovering treasures and selling them to merchants.
